text.section: The Secretary shall issue to each individual who is certified as a private detective under this subtitle a certification card that identifies the individual as a certified private detective.

section.section: Subject to this subsection, the Secretary shall determine the form and content of the certification card.
The certification card shall be of a size and made of materials appropriate for its intended use, as provided under § 13-407 of this subtitle.

The certification card shall contain:
a statement that in substance specifies that the individual is certified by the Secretary as a private detective;
the name of the licensed private detective agency with or by which the individual is associated or employed; and
any information that the Secretary considers appropriate to:
identify the individual; or
specify the authority of the individual.
